review: LOVE it - and LOVE, LOVE not paying for cable any more!! The whole thing was a breeze - arrived fast, easy set up, totally user-friendly.  LOVE IT
author: Mrs. Johnstone

review: It works great and I'd user friendly,I just feel if you are paying 100 dollars for it that it should have some shows and or movies for free.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Good product and easy menu's. Connection to wifi is really good and no issues streamingvideos.
author: CoolJets

review: just didn't like the organization of the home page, and it was difficult to look for things.I prefer the apple tvamazon fire is trying to do too many things
author: Jeannin-Melissa Jeremiah

review: Price was dropped by $16 less than a week after I made purchase.  Amazon refused to offer the difference.  Returning for a Roku 3 which has more content anyway.
author: Drew Caldwell

review: So far, so good! Went cable free a few weeks ago and this is working very well for me...
author: M. Johnson
